website_summaries.verdict: These height adjustable shepherd's hooks are a versatile option, ideal for uneven land. Affordable and convenient.
pros: Height can be adjusted to three different lengths, ranging from 17.5" to 36.5"
Stainless steel construction is reasonably sturdy
cons: Not suitable for large, heavy items
Somewhat short, even at their tallest

customer_reviews.title: These things are GREAT for the proper weight hanging item! Solar lanterns YES No huge hanging plants
customer_reviews.text: Really, these work just fine for hanging solar lanterns! I love that the heights if the hooks are adjustable because I have some raised areas in my garden that just wouldn't look right with tall lights. You're given two, threaded sections and the top section that is the hook and the bottom one that is the ground stake consisting of two long prongs. For the all hook, use both threaded sections and for shorter hangers, a she only one threaded section. Will these hold a 10lb. Hanging plant? No. It's not made for that application. Will it hold a lantern garden light and stand up to weather? Yes! Plenty sturdy! Buying more!
customer_reviews.author: L. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Hooks
customer_reviews.text: These hooks are a good deal for the price. I bought them to use with a humming bird feeder, and it works well for that. The hooks are small, and good for small items, not bigger flower baskets. The package had 4 hooks in it, which was good, because some of the sections would not screw in straight or all the way, resulting in a crook in the pole. I'm only using 2 hooks and was able to get enough sections to have 2 nice, straight poles. For what I was looking for, these hooks work well, and I'm pleased. The price was good, and the service was very good, arriving as predicted.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small glass decorations.
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I wanted. Other reviews said they are not sturdy enough to hold a hummingbird feeder. I did not try that. I used them to hold small 2-D stained glass birds and small 3 to 4 inch diameter glass balls in large flower pots.They are perfect for that and I like the option of the varied heights of the hooks and having the glass ornaments at different heights in my flower pots.
customer_reviews.author: Jo in Northern MI

customer_reviews.title: Plenty heavy duty for their size. Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what's up with the reviews complaining about these not being heavy duty. They are plenty strong for their size. They are not tall enough for big hanging baskets anyway - for those you'd want the tall ones like what they have at HD. These are the perfect size for my witch balls (no extender in my picture) and lantern (one extender). I like that the size is adjustable and that there are four of them - great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Far too Flinsy for Practical Use
customer_reviews.text: These came in a VERY small box and have to be screwed together. We could not get them to hold the lightest flower pot without toppling over. There is no way they can hold the items in the photo as advertised without bending easily. But studier hooks.... if we can't think of any way to use these they have to go back. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Healey

customer_reviews.title: Only enough extender parts to make 2 short shepherd's hook poles for my bird feeders
customer_reviews.text: This product is flimsy, and it is not good at all for bird feeders. It makes 4 very short poles which are way too short for hummingbird feeders. I made 2 poles out of the parts, and they are still too short, and the product is so flimsy that I'm sure these poles won't last anytime at all. I now will have to purchase something adequate for my needs. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Lucas

customer_reviews.title: The ability to extend height of the hook was great and these go into the ground much easier than ...
customer_reviews.text: The ability to extend height of the hook was great and these go into the ground much easier than most but still stay in the ground. I prefer this single ground insert over the 2 bottom ones as they are much more difficult to put the hooks into the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon O'Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!! Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This was an incomplete order!! I was supposed to get all the parts to assemble 4 total Shepard's hooks. There were only enough pieces for 2.5 Shepard's hooks This was an incomplete order. The hooks cannot withstand even a wooden birdhouse without losing strength and begin to immediately lean and remain crooked. They do not meet the standards needed for holding anything displayable on the hook. A total disappointment based on the above information I have provided.
customer_reviews.author: SAUNDRA D.

customer_reviews.title: Would be great for an Event
customer_reviews.text: I gave these 5 Stars because they will work for some people for light weight items to hang without bending or falling over. These go together easily without any problems. I fear for my use they are not heavy enough and will bend or fall over. Unfortunately I will have to return them. I need them to hold Rocks in Containers with lights. So this was not a good choice for me. Those that have asked: These hooks should easily hold Mason Jars with lights with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: z1RoniTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & extendable!
customer_reviews.text: I like that these are extendable allowing for different heights. They also appear to be very sturdy. I ordered one set then ordered another for use in the yard for Xmas decorations. I would have given 5 stars but the first time I ordered, I got a notification that they had been returned due to damage in transit so I reordered them. Then on one of them, the anchor on the stake snapped off when I was moving it but I'm still using it; will see if it stays in the ground in our very strong winds.
customer_reviews.author: L. Winter in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: So perfect... thank you!
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I was looking for - they are extendable so I could make it full length as shown in photo or shorter, which would have worked and been cute too. They seem really sturdy and the metal is thicker than the ones that I saw around the "yard" while visiting. Time will tell on how they weather; but at this point, looks great. Also the price is really reasonable compared to others on Amazon. :)
customer_reviews.author: HeatherLynn

customer_reviews.title: A real value............
customer_reviews.text: Certainly, these modular shepherd's hooks are a real bargain for quality at a very low price. They are super easy to assemble and you have the option to make them different heights. It would be nice if the provider supplied another extender for those of us who have the use for a slightly taller hook. However, I would definitely recommend the product and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased with my purchase of shepherd's hooks
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with my purchase of shepherd's hooks. I did not want to spend big money but I wanted quality and function. This place delivered both. I have used them for lighting, a hummingbird feeder, and even a wind chime. I love that they are adjustable. Thank you SO much for having a great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shepherd's hooks
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect shepherd's hooks for small feeders and decorative items. They are sturdy for their size, but they are small and meant for small items, they are not meant for large birdhouses or feeders. The photos shown are both using one extension. Also, another review mentioned they had too many of one extender and not enough of the others, the threaded "male" adapter piece is removable and can be added to another piece as needed. Bottom line is they are a great item for the price, I would buy them again and I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: quality not so great
customer_reviews.text: just ok.....I put these out for halloween, they had only been outside in the elements for a month, and one of them has already rusted and broken apart on the bottom where the stake goes into the ground. Can probably be fixed with superglue, but should have lasted way longer before breaking. I purchased these because of their small size. I just wanted something unassuming and small to hang lanterns on. The size is good, but the quality is lacking.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased these shepherds hooks to hang Japanese beetle traps around my yard. I watched a video review of these and I liked what I saw. I have to say they are so much more than I thought I was going to get. The quality is great, they screw together perfectly and I realize they’ll also be perfect for hanging solar lanterns in my landscape. Tip: to make everything easier be sure the ground is not dry hardened from lack of rain before setting. If so, water area some just prior.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Peach

customer_reviews.title: Got more than I paid for.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a hummingbird feeder to place in one of my planters. So I ordered the extendable shepherd's hooks. The hook worked fine but the planter wasn't deep enough so I relocated into a larger pot with a tall lavender plant. The hummingbird feeder chain was too long and hung in the plant but I just kept adding another extendable rod and wella!. Perfect. No tilting, held the feeder with food and had the right height to view the hummingbirds feeding. Additional PLUS, I have more sheperds hooks to place around my deck & grounds. Actually, these would make a perfect gift. Yup, I got more than I paid for/
customer_reviews.author: Claire E Huttemeyer

customer_reviews.title: Shepherd’s Hooks - The Good & Bad
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 sets of these. One set was missing some of the screws that are required to connect the sections together so I was unable to use one of the hooks in the set (4 hooks per set). The bottom piece snapped off another hook when we pulled it out of the ground on the first occasion we used it. I needed them for a wedding I was hosting so I wasn’t able to exchange the set that was missing the parts the screws. Other than these issues the hooks worked well for their purpose. They were sturdy and held the vases sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Reaves

customer_reviews.title: Rusts in less than 1 year
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these to hang deer repellent around in our garden. The design and versatility of the products seemed fine, but in less than one year, we are finding that they are either rusting or the paint is peeling on many of them, while on a very few, the finish is OK. Looks as though there is a quality control problem. I do not recommend these items.
customer_reviews.author: jud

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: They assemble easy and are easy to place in the ground but are not very sturdy at all. If you have any size pots with weight I would probably look for something else. I could not even get some of the joints to screw together tight...they would just get a little tight,pop and be loose again to be re-tightened.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Lodge

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these hooks! Just what I needed and love the fact that you can make them different lengths!
customer_reviews.author: T. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: The best hooks for hanging solar Lights on
customer_reviews.text: I really do like these very very much. They are heavy enough to be very sturdy and the idea that I can make them almost any length I want makes them just perfect to hang my lights around our pool. Among all the shepherds hooks I looked at, and I had at least 12 of them to choose from, these seemed to be the best. And since I received them I know I made the right choice. Thank you for a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: ljherrell

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy or heavy duty at all
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely not heavy duty or sturdy. It took forever to try to get it into place to where it wasn't leaning over really badly. It's still lean sideways some with a bird feeder hanging on it. One of my other ones has a small wind chime hanging on it and that one will not stay straight up either. The bottom part that goes into the ground where it connects to the pole is already bent.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly E.

customer_reviews.title: Great Light Duty Hook
customer_reviews.text: Much to my surprise, each of the four hooks were extendable. It was very nice to have that option. The hooks were perfect for my needs. I wanted to hang a fixture that would hold a larger citronella candle(about a 16 oz candle. The hooks come with a stake and each extenstion screws in. Do not attempt to use with anything to heavy.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Cheap for a reason!
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly made. Each hook comes in 4 sections that must be screwed together. The threads on the metal pieces are poorly manufactured and had residual debris in the threads which required cleaning out. Rust resistant they are not, the metal poles and threads were rusting in the box which will I am certain make this purchase a one season use and in the can it will go before next year. Buyer beware they are cheap for a reason. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality, but great price
customer_reviews.text: They are inexpensive, and were delivered in less than 24 hours. That I appreciate!! 1 of 4 broke while putting them in the ground. We had to fix it with electrical tape. It held up with a hanging lantern in perfect weather with no wind (not sure if it would fair the same with a wind).
customer_reviews.author: YorkieLove

customer_reviews.title: Sad results
customer_reviews.text: These will not hold a large fern, especially after a good rain as they get too heavy. This bike portion is made of plastic and a couple of them have broken when placing them into the ground. The pieces are screwed together and if the plant is too heavy this group will break off at the at the joint and then you can't use that any longer
customer_reviews.author: Betty B Martin

customer_reviews.title: SHORT one Pronged BASE! SHOT 4 extender cs also!
customer_reviews.text: SO only 3 usable............ LUCKY SELLER /Amazon as I made 3 and will set the 4th into a hole in a BRICK w/o base. The white box in the =y ate in FROM China was opened at one end inside the box w/other boxed items This is the !st time of several I have ordered that I have been disappointed in this particular item so only 2 stars sand only 2 extender so can NOT make 36.5
customer_reviews.author: Baby Girl

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: These are a great idea however they are a bit flimsy when you put them together and hang a bird feeder on them. Maybe I need to hang a smaller bird feeder? (Mine holds 2 lbs of bird seed) also, some of the rods I received already had paint chipping off of them and were rusty. These will work for now but I’ll need to purchase a higher quality shepherds hook in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: CH0NEY

customer_reviews.title: the perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for some small out door lanterns, they are perfect, I did not make them as tall as you can for my purpose that would have been too tall so it was great to have that option, I had no problem putting them together and for my lanterns they are plenty sturdy
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Good for Hummer Feeders
customer_reviews.text: I only need a couple, but the modular design allowed me to assemble several at just the right (higher and shorter) heights. For hummingbird feeders these are more than adequate for supporting their weight. Attaching a photo.
customer_reviews.author: TexARC, aka A.Ron Carmichael

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money
customer_reviews.text: These are the cheapest, flimsiest things ever. The metal is very weak and the connection points are even weaker. The first one I tried to insert into damp ground with very little force, snapped. The second one I was able to get into the ground and it lasted a few days before a bluejay landed on the bird feeder I had hanging from it, and it also snapped in two. And "extendable" does not mean telescoping or anything like that. Extendable means you use sections from the other pieces to extend. This is how I only ended up with two instead of four.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Not as shown
customer_reviews.text: These are very flimsy and do not look like the photo. The insert to push into the ground is also different and bends easily. I'm shocked that Amazon allows them to use a photo That is completely different from what you are getting. I will be contacting the vendor about returning. Not recommended
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Stripped out pole ends
customer_reviews.text: The sections without screw ends where reamed out and when i put them together they are loose and a little wobbly i will have to glue them to hold tight and the box they came in was damaged with a big hole at one corner other than that a fair product
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L.

customer_reviews.title: Best for light items. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old assembled them, it was that easy! I used it for a large hanging basket, which I would not recommend. It was tipping over. Also, the stakes on the bottom twisted a little when I was trying to put it in the ground and rest the hanging basket on it. I would recommend this product for lighter items.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Strafford

customer_reviews.title: ridiculously misleading
customer_reviews.text: you aren't getting 4 full size shepherds' hooks that you can make shorter, but 4 bases & hooks that are useless. plus they are cheaply made & 2 bases crumpled while trying to be set into the ground, which means I can have 2 flimsy kind of usable shepherds' hooks. NOT WORTH THE MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Too Strong
customer_reviews.text: While these shepherd hooks are useful for anything light such as a bird house or solar light they are not sturdy enough to hold a hanging basket of flowers. The weight bows the pole because they are so thin. They can be assembled easily.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M. Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Paint was peeling off
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived with paint chipping of the extension pieces. Thus I had to return it has to t would have rusted in a short time. I bought it to hang flower baskets, so I would have had to use all extensions. Not sure what you can hang on the shortest setting, as it barely gets out and off the ground. Also, I did not personally like that the hook was not smooth, it was a harsh bend/crimp. And the end of the hook is covered with a plastic tip.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Really good shephard hooks
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice hooks, I especially like the fact you can adjust the height, that was really what I needed along with sturdiness, my flowers were getting too high and covering my solar hanging lights, so it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Burke

customer_reviews.title: Damage on pole for sherperds hooks
customer_reviews.text: I received this item on time opened it up and started to put it together I notice that a couple of the piece had cracks in them I just wanted to let you know in case anyone else has the same problem . I was surprise when I saw the splits in them
customer_reviews.author: Toni Snell

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. These Shepherd's Hooks are very easy to assemble and to stake into the ground. They look great and are easily moved from place to place. They were delivered right on time and I'm happy with the seller. Extra extension parts would have made this a 5-star purchase. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Caroline C

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY MANY DEFECTS
customer_reviews.text: received these today pure crap. the plastic base broke when I pushed it into the soft ground. You can actually break it with your hand. the rods are already peeling away and rust forming which means that are not coated properly. the slightest scratch will cause rust . the sliver screws are not attached to the rods so they don't tighten. SENDING THESE BACK. DONT BUY
customer_reviews.author: palm

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP AND FLIMSY!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst!!! They are so cheap and flimsy!! I hung a small fern on it and it broke right on half breaking the pot my plant was in that was my late mother's!!! Horribly flimsy...not worth the money at all!!!! So mad!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Not durable, not worth your money
customer_reviews.text: Had to screwed together four pieces. Screw would not tighten. Pole not straight, not sturdy. If you Put this in your yard you would constantly be trying to keep it together.
customer_reviews.author: Jody N.

customer_reviews.title: Good for our needs
customer_reviews.text: Got these to hang paper lanterns from for my son's prom party. They were easy to assemble and sturdy enough for our purposes. Not sure how much weight they could support though.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy M

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Price
customer_reviews.text: Set of four for a great price. I'm a thorough shopper on a limited income, so I picked your product after looking at other vendors. I'm very happy with this product, for the quality and price. I will be looking at other Sorbus products for my future home product purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Gar

customer_reviews.title: NOT HEAVY DUTY!!
customer_reviews.text: I was not satisfied with these hooks as they are not sturdy enough for the plants I have. The hanging plants still sit on the ground & the hook was bending even though it was all the way in the ground. These are definitely NOT heavy duty for a hanging plant! Will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Shaniqua

customer_reviews.title: Becomes flimsy when adding multiple rods together.
customer_reviews.text: They are smaller that I had anticipated. The height can be adjusted by adding more than one rods together. Keep in mind the higher it gets the more flimsy it becomes. If you keep it at regular height, works great in flower pots.
customer_reviews.author: Page

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: There was chunks of paint missing when I opened the package and one of the connecting screws was missing. I over looked that and decided to use them anyway. I hung my petunias on them and the shepherds hook bent on the third day. I straightened it out and now I can hang on it is a small wind chime. Very disappointed in my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: abcd4ever

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Should just ordered one because I used these to hang bird feeders for my cat. Well hung to many HOA got mad. Anyhow they didnt fall over in the storms we had so thats a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Dean

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete - Short of expectations
customer_reviews.text: Snow melted - Time to put the hooks up, and bam, missing parts. Can't find a way to get a hold over the seller. Product came short one of the connect studs. These the tread is not standard or metic - No hardware store was able to match - I would still like a replacement part......
customer_reviews.author: Rafael S. Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Shepard hooks
customer_reviews.text: I put one together already. Seems to hold the weight of my hummingbird feeder well. Approx 10 lbs. :)
customer_reviews.author: Addie G. Cyr

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality, sturdy, attaches to different heights easily. Bought them to replace hooks from another company that where useless and cheap. Thank goodness I found a reputable company product
customer_reviews.author: Lillian S.

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but a little flimsy
customer_reviews.text: One of the hooks came broken. Another has trouble staying upright when a plant is hanging on it. Great size though.”, love that they can disassemble for winter storage.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Great for nectar feeders!
customer_reviews.text: This came in an open box so I was concerned at first; but all the pieces were present and in seemingly new condition. It’s sturdy enough to hold my glass hummingbird feeder and help my swamp milkweed stand straight.
customer_reviews.author: Mike and Mari

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Shepard’s hooks for wind chimes
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Shepard’s hooks for a wind chime garden I designed for my grandson who is obsessed with them. Adjustable so perfect! Very happy indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Ayres Seiden

customer_reviews.title: lightweight planter stakes
customer_reviews.text: Due to its light weight, it's not suitable for plants or bird feeders. But it is good for decorative windchimes or other lighter weight garden decor. I was only able to build 2 stakes, not 4, with the materials supplies.
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor hooks
customer_reviews.text: Nice one just got it. ,, good price. ,, will order more
customer_reviews.author: sscrusir007

customer_reviews.title: Great variable height and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I wanted! I have 4 covered bird feeders that I want to hang in my daylily garden. They needed to be a certain height (deer nose height) because I am going to fill the feeders with “deer scram” to try to deter the deer from eating my daylily blooms. They are sturdy and weather resistant so I will hope they work next summer when the deer come to munch in my city garden!Great variable
customer_reviews.author: Gaily

customer_reviews.title: NIce for lower birdfeeders
customer_reviews.text: These are study but not high for larger plants. I use them for bird feeders and they and the squirrels love them!
customer_reviews.author: MOMMOM

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, heavy duty quality! Much nicer than I expected. I love that you can make them different heights. If you have trouble screwing the parts together just use a rubber lid opener to grip and it goes right together
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for the Asking Price!
customer_reviews.text: These hooks serve their purpose very well. I would advise you to use anti seize grease on the threads so they don’t rust out. Happy with my purchase so far!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Wilburg

customer_reviews.title: Great Hook!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these stakes so I could hang up a wind chime that I had for awhile. They are pretty durable. Super easy to put together and put in the ground. I'm happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nean

customer_reviews.title: Great price, easy assemble, sturdy enough, fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased with the shepherds hooks. Great price, easy to assemble & I like the fact I can make them different heights. Fast delivery. Thanks so much!! KW
customer_reviews.author: MrsClean

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: These hooks sets are not good products. Very Flemsy. One of them broke just trying to screw them together. They don't even hold a hanging basket of flowers. Cheaply made. I guess you get what you pay for. I do not recommend getting these!!!
customer_reviews.author: niknikrn

customer_reviews.title: Too flimsy for small plants
customer_reviews.text: They really aren't ideal for plants. Even a very small pot pulls the hook down when watered. I'll use it for solar lights I guess but they are quite cheap and flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Paterson

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy at all
customer_reviews.text: This is not worth buying if you want to hang anything on it. Anything you put on it makes it bend way over or completely fall off. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Alice C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for stringing lighted lanterns!
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for hanging a small string of lantern lights along my front walkway. I like that I can use them in multiple seasons with different lanterns, and adjust the height.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney325

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Very sturdy and thick.
customer_reviews.text: These shepherds hooks are great! Nice and thick. Very easy to put together. There very sturdy. A really good buy. Worth the money. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: beverly walker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement
customer_reviews.text: I had small shepherd hooks that deteriorated over time. These are perfect because of the adjustable nature and the value for the price allows me to keep a spare.
customer_reviews.author: Vegas-D

customer_reviews.title: not as shown in photo but ok
customer_reviews.text: did not have 2 prongs as shown in photo; came with a plastic cone type prong that went into the ground and then you stick the metal rod into it. Worked fine except 2 broke when trying to shove into the ground. These wobbled some without a ton of weight but it had been raining. Used for a wedding
customer_reviews.author: Mchristie

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs down!
customer_reviews.text: There was no measurements given in the original description and I was very disappointed to find they are only tiny,flimsy, screw together rusty pressed metal. One barely supports a small hummingbird feeder. Not for hanging a flower basket. I would not have waisted my money had the description been full disclosure.
customer_reviews.author: A & Jay

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy, easily breakable! Rusts easily!
customer_reviews.text: Well these things break easily... hadn’t even had them up for a week and walked outside to see that one of the hook bottoms completely broke off causing the plant to fall. Not fixable nor are they sturdy when you get them to the “adjustable” height you would like. Save the money and get some real ones from Home Depot of Lowe’s.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S.

customer_reviews.title: At that price, I should have known...
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product. I chose these because $20 for 4 hooks seemed like a great deal, but you get what you pay for... Two of the hook pieces were stripped out so they won’t stay on and the other pieces slip if you try to tighten them. I was able to make two longer poles with the remaining pieces, but they can’t hold much more than a small hummingbird feeder.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: options on sizes and look good
customer_reviews.text: these are great. they come broken in 3 pieces for easy shipping - but its awesome that each hook is in 3 parts because you have options on the size of the hook you want. You can either have them shorter or taller. They seem of decent enough quality to do the job. i would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Walsh

customer_reviews.title: versatile
customer_reviews.text: Great that these shepherds hooks are size adjustable. that makes them usable for several purposes and you can extend them taller or shorter as plants grow or for different size garden lights or lanterns. The only con is they have a cheesey looking cap on the end making them look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Ria

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Super cheap. They don’t even hold a simple hanging plant. The one I have holding a small 16 ounce sign is rusting.
customer_reviews.author: apbrandt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I only wanted them for bird suet cages. Thought they would be bigger. No problem I got two of the size that worked. The other two small ones will work for Halloween decorations.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for some solar lights I had bought. They were really easy to put together and they look very cute in my garden with the lights at night.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie

customer_reviews.title: Shipping condition
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, easy to assemble, nicely finished, good value. Only quams is, half the parts were in the box and half were in the bubble mailing envelop which could not be done in shipping. My though is, it was divided to fit in the envelop so it was not fat package. Not that this made a difference for post office mailing and the cost I paid for mailing. I like these for its size to use for small wind chimes and hummingbird feeders.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How to get ahold of someone when im not happy
customer_reviews.text: They were way to short, I only got two out of them. If your selling plant hanging poles, you need to let your customers know that they are almost touching the ground if you make 3 or more out of them. Also when a customer needs to talk to Amazon, when they go to contact us & they have to download to do so, bad business. I don't have space on my phone to do so. Thank you Roy Bialik
customer_reviews.author: Roy Bialik

customer_reviews.title: Great heights
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to put together and you can put them at all different heights for effect. Happy I didn't buy nonadjustable ones.
customer_reviews.author: IVRNGAL

customer_reviews.title: 2 or 4 hooks?
customer_reviews.text: I didnt read the measurements closely enough. That is my fault though and tbey are really cute when you just make 2 bigger hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Gardening Pet Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great shepherd hooks at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: These hooks are perfect! They come in 3 pieces each, so you can select the height you choose. I purchased these to hang solar lights in my yard and they are fantastic. I am very happy with this purchase and would recommend to anyone looking to hang things in their yard.
customer_reviews.author: Pam K

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: One segment broke off as I pushed it into the ground. Not mentioned in the listing is, if you use sections to make one pole longer, it means there are less sections to use on the other poles. So, you really only get two long poles, not four adjustable ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley J Collins

customer_reviews.title: quality less than amount paid
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the quality of the hooks for what amount I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Donna W.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Each hook comes in three parts so they can be 2 heights. They were easy to put together and work exactly as expected. I am using them to hang solar mason jars with fairy lights.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting....
customer_reviews.text: While I purchased this in July, it only took until Oct/Nov for me to start seeing rust appearing on these stakes. Also, the additional prong provided, meant to hold the hooks in place with more support, actually get in the way of being able to thrust these stakes more into my planters. I didn't have that problem previously when I had simple stakes that had a single shaft.
customer_reviews.author: Alexi Saunders

customer_reviews.title: False advertising!
customer_reviews.text: I received this item and am returning it. It says set of 4 with the image of 4 completely put together. The box had just 1 hook, 5 ground stakes and 7 rods.
customer_reviews.author: april

customer_reviews.title: Feels stout
customer_reviews.text: Haven't hung anything heavy yet, but it's all steel and feels stout. I know it will hold the 1lb sign in front of our camper with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Too flimsy for one plastic hummingbird feeder
customer_reviews.text: The are very weak and bend over even with just a small plastic hummingbird feeder.
customer_reviews.author: FrequentBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hold plant.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shepherd hooks to put around my patio to hold my hanging plants. They put together very easily but after putting in the ground it wouldn't even hold the plant. It bent right over. I was disappointed. They weren't thick enough to hold any thing with a little weight. They would be fine for anything light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A really good product.
customer_reviews.text: They are a bit shorter than I wanted for bird feeders. I am saving them to use for plants in the spring. I have hung seed bells on them and suet cakes.
customer_reviews.author: LucyLue

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, it's junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Won't screw together tight. Loose at all connecting points. Screw in only so far. Tiny, flimsy. Waste of time and money. Roughly $7 a piece. Could find better quality at the dollar store. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Nice in that you can configure with 3 different heights
customer_reviews.text: Nice in that you can configure with 3 different heights. Threading together can be difficult. Not sure how they will stand up to moisture, may rust early. Suggest spraying with 303 and / or applying an outdoor wax.
customer_reviews.author: David Benson

customer_reviews.title: Very weak.
customer_reviews.text: In no way are these hangers robust. For small baskets they`re fine, say 6-8 inches diameter.
customer_reviews.author: Peter D`Alessandro

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good value
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with these hooks. I like the versatility of the design
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Shepherd Hooks, Use short or tall
customer_reviews.text: Love these shepherd hooks. Love that they are in sections so you can make them short or tall. They are well made, strong metal, and not flimsy. I would buy again and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Kyer

customer_reviews.title: Only for very light weight hanging
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great item for very light weight plants etc. although it includes extra pieces to extend the height please don’t use them as it will only hold less weight
customer_reviews.author: Moshe

customer_reviews.title: bent in half with a 7lb planter
customer_reviews.text: flimsy, bent in half. will not use them. They are going in the trash
customer_reviews.author: Donna Teagle

product_meta.title: Sorbus Shepherd's Hooks - Set of 4 Extendable Garden Planter Stakes for Bird Feeders, Outdoor Décor, Plants, Lights, Lanterns, Flower Baskets, and More! Heavy Duty (4 Pack)
feature_bullets: SHEPHERD’S HOOKS (Set of 4) – Ideal for hanging outdoor décor, plants, lights, lanterns, flower baskets, bird feeders, and more
HEIGHT ADJUSTABLE – Each hook has 3 extenders for different height options: 17.5” – 26.5” – 36.5”
ATTRACTIVE – The black finish adds style and elegance to any outdoor space– Great for weddings, anniversaries, parties, and celebrations
HEAVY DUTY & SUPER STRONG – Constructed of durable steel that will last for many seasons and can be used in any weather – Very easy to carry and move around your outdoor space
PACKAGE INCLUDES –Includes shepherd’s hook, extenders, and stakes

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars737 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
